DataElement.preferredName: Prior Therapy And No Evidence of Hepatitis C Virus Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study that has had prior therapy and no presence of Hepatitis C Virus as outlined in protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Therapy And No Evidence of Disease Hepatitis C Virus Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._Diagnostic tests fail to detect presence of disease._A small, enveloped, positive sense single strand RNA virus in the family Flaviviridae. The genome consists of a single RNA molecule with a single open reading frame._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy.

Concepts.definition: Prior action or administration of therapeutic agents that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.

A small, enveloped, positive sense single strand RNA virus in the family Flaviviridae. The genome consists of a single RNA molecule with a single open reading frame.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient has previously tre
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has previously treated and eradicated HCV, they have minimal hepatic injury?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has a history of hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection, have they been treated and cured or if currently on treatment, do they have an undetectable HCV viral load?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has previously treated and eradicated HCV, do they have minimal hepatic injury?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has a history of Hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection, and is currently on treatment, do they have an undetectable HCV viral load?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has a history of Hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection, have they been treated and cured?
